root.name: The Powerpuff Girls: Bad Mojo Jojo
root.description: Game playIn The Powerpuff Girls Bad Mojo Jojo you play as Blossom, the leader of the Powerpuff Girls as you are tasked with fighting Mojo Jojo and his Minions as well as collecting tokens in the levels.Blossom in a level of The Powerpuff girls bad Mojo Jojo
